channel.title: What base to use?
channel.description:
Well I am currently beggining to create HBG-Scape V2 and wanted to know what server to use as my base...
I want vengeance, specs working, graphics, and maybe skillcape emotes (if not ill fix them myself)
I dont care about many ships or areas because im changing them ALL anyways, basically I am changing MOST of the items, the only things I wont change are the stuff like veng, specs, emotes...
I am changing teleports, xp given, slayer stuff, commands, ranks, etc...
All I need is a base client without too many bugs and with a few items working to start creating on, any1 suggest one please?

item.title: What base to use?
item.dc:creator: @HahBahGee HahBahGee
item.description:
@HahBahGee wrote:

ummm a little of both, i want one with skills working, veng working, specs working, because atm I dont know how to code that stuff, but i also dont care if it has too many shops or hundreds of npc’s because im redo-ing most of that anyways…

Read full topic

you looking for a clean source or one with stuff in it?
